92600.content:
@moukie#92560 
```
WITH recursive f AS (
    (SELECT staff.staff_id, sup_staff_id, store_id, last_name, first_name, p.rental_id, amount
     FROM staff
              NATURAL JOIN rental
              JOIN payment p on rental.rental_id = p.rental_id)
    UNION ALL
    (SELECT staff.staff_id, staff.sup_staff_id, f.store_id, staff.last_name, staff.first_name, rental_id, f.amount
     FROM staff,
          f
     WHERE staff.staff_id = f.sup_staff_id)
)
SELECT
       rank() OVER (ORDER BY  SUM(f.amount) DESC) as rankCompany,
       rank() OVER (PARTITION BY c.name ORDER BY  SUM(f.amount) DESC) as categoryRank,
       c.name,
       f.staff_id,
       last_name lname,
       first_name fName,
       SUM(amount)
FROM f
         JOIN store s ON f.store_id = s.store_id
         JOIN rental on f.rental_id = rental.rental_id
         JOIN inventory i on rental.inventory_id = i.inventory_id
         JOIN film f2 on i.film_id = f2.film_id
         JOIN film_category fc on f2.film_id = fc.film_id
         JOIN category c on fc.category_id = c.category_id
GROUP BY f.staff_id, c.name, last_name, first_name
ORDER BY rankCompany, categoryRank
```

92664.content:
@421blazeitfgt#92650 

`select title, array( select distinct country.country

                    from inventory 

                    join store on inventory.store_id=store.store_id

                    join address on address.address_id=store.address_id

                    join city on address.city_id=city.city_id

                    join country on city.country_id=country.country_id
                    

                    where inventory.film_id=film.film_id
                    ) as cities
                    
from film, unnest(string_to_array(title, ' ')) as ime(rjec)

where lower(rjec)%'videotejp'

`

92667.content:
@421blazeitfgt#92650 

select title, array( select distinct country.country

                    from inventory 

                    join store on inventory.store_id=store.store_id

                    join address on address.address_id=store.address_id

                    join city on address.city_id=city.city_id

                    join country on city.country_id=country.country_id
                    

                    where inventory.film_id=film.film_id
                    ) as cities
                    
from film, unnest(string_to_array(title, ' ')) as ime(rjec)

where lower(rjec)%'videotejp'

92753.content:
Ja ću postat kako što riješim od zzv-ova, pa evo redom... (1) - crosstab - cred za ovaj ide prijatelju shoutout LG

![](assets/2020-11-14/00034.png)

```
create temp table quarters(quarter int);
insert into quarters values(1);
insert into quarters values(2);
insert into quarters values(3);
insert into quarters values(4);

select * from crosstab(
	$$
    	select title, extract(quarter from payment_date) q, sum(amount)
		from payment join rental on payment.rental_id = rental.rental_id
			join inventory on rental.inventory_id = inventory.inventory_id
    		join film on inventory.film_id = film.film_id
		where to_tsvector('english', film.title | | " " | | film.description) @@ to_tsquery('english', 'fanci | amus')
		group by title, q
    	order by title, q
    $$,
    $$
    	select * from quarters order by quarter
    $$
) as pivotTable(filmTitle varchar(255), q1 numeric(10,2), q2 numeric(10,2), q3 numeric(10,2), q4 numeric(10,2))
```

93298.content:
@moukie#93214 meni ovo radi:

WITH r AS (

	SELECT muny.name_2, ST_Intersection(roads.geom, railways.geom) intrsctn, MIN(ST_Distance(ST_Intersection(roads.geom, railways.geom), pois.geom)) distance 

	FROM muny, roads, railways, pois

	WHERE pois.fclass = 'hospital' AND muny.name_1 = 'Splitsko-Dalmatinska' AND

          ST_Intersects(roads.geom, railways.geom) AND ST_Intersects(ST_Intersection(roads.geom, railways.geom), muny.geom)                                                                  

	GROUP BY muny.name_2, ST_Intersection(roads.geom, railways.geom)

)

SELECT name_2, ROUND(MAX(distance))                                                                           

FROM r

GROUP BY name_2


@stoper5#93280 na prvoj slici ti u WHERE dijelu fale zagrade kod provjere uvjeta s ts_vectorom: (x OR y) AND...
